title: What’s the best plot twist in a novel? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without giving anything away, I heartily recommend Simulacron-3 by Daniel F. Galouye The Running of Beasts by Barry Malzberg and Bill Pronzini To say anything more would be to spoil it. If you must know what the twists are without reading them first, check Wikipedia, which usually gives everything away.
